name: 10 Average Questions about Avengers: Age of Ultron

questions.text: What do the Avengers refer to as Natasha's ability to calm the Hulk back into Bruce Banner?
questions.explanation:
Lullaby.

	The lullaby consists of Natasha talking calmly to the Hulk and letting him touch her while she touches him. The calming effect of the lullaby works and the Hulk turns back to Bruce Banner at the movie's beginning. She institutes the lullaby once more as they are readying to leave Sovokia on the helicarrier.

questions.text: While trying to save Hawkeye and a child from Ultron's bullets, Pietro Maximoff is killed.
questions.explanation:
True.

	While the Avengers are loading the citizens of Sovokia onto crafts to board the helicarrier, Hawkeye sees a little boy named Costel away from his mother. While trying to get to the little boy, Hawkeye is shot at by Ultron. Seeing that Hawkeye and the little boy are going to die, Pietro runs in front of the bullets taking all of them. He dies in front of Hawkeye.

James Spader.

	James Spader provided the voice of the robot Ultron which Tony Stark was creating to save the world. Ultron's version of saving the world was to destroy it. James Spader was the first choice for the voice for Ultron. Joss Whedon believed that James had the kind of hypnotic voice that would work for both humor and fear.Joss Whedon wanted James Spader only for his voice, but James wanted to do more with the character than just the voice so during filming James Spader wore an antennae three feet above his head with red balls attached to it. The balls were the location of Ultron's eyes so the other actors would know how far to look up when delivering their lines to Ultron.

questions.text: At the end of the credits, what Marvel character is shown putting on the Infinity Gauntlet and uttering, "Fine. I'll do it myself."?
questions.explanation:
Thanos.

	Thanos was born on the moon Titan. He was the last child born to Mentor and Sui-San. Unlike his other brothers, Thanos was born with a monstrous face. Thanos is a deadly villain after the stones to put into his Infinity Gauntlet. As a character he first appeared in the credits of "The Avengers". He was then seen in "Guardians of the Galaxy" and at the end of "Avengers: Age of Ultron" when he decides to go after the stones he needs to fill the Infinity Gauntlet.

questions.text: After the party at Tony Stark's place, who is the first Avenger to try lifting Thor's hammer?
questions.explanation:
Hawkeye (Clint Barton).

	Thor's hammer is on the table between the Avengers as they are talking after the party. Clint is the first Avenger to try lifting the hammer. When he fails, Tony tries with his human hand and Iron Man hand. He even tries with Rhody's help. Bruce tries next. Steve is the last man to try it. He budges the hammer slightly, but could not move it.

questions.text: After leaving the safe house, where does Thor go for help with the visions Wanda Maximoff gave to him in Africa?
questions.explanation:
London.

	Thor goes to Eric Selvig at his teaching position at the University of London for help. Eric takes Thor to find the Water of Sight. While standing in the water, Thor goes back to the vision Wanda had given him and finishes it to reveal a plan to help the Avengers against Ultron.

questions.text: What is the name of Hawkeye's wife who the Avengers meet after fleeing Africa?
questions.explanation:
Laura.

	Laura Barton lives on a farm with her two children and one on the way. Clint sets up a safe house with Nick Fury's help to keep them safe. Clint and Laura's third child was to be named Natalie, but the baby was born a boy so his name became Nathaniel Pietro Barton. Nathaniel's middle name comes from Pietro Maximoff, who died protecting Clint. Tony claims Laura is a Shield agent and that her children are tiny Shield agents.

questions.text: What is the name of the creature that Ultron creates and Thor brings to life with his hammer?
questions.explanation:
Vision.

	The power in Thor's hammer brings Vision to life. Thor explains that Vision wears one of the Infinity Stones in the center of his forehead. Vision tells the Avengers that he is neither part of Jarvis or Ultron. He just is.

questions.text: During the fight at the beginning of the movie, Iron Man curses after unsuccessfully getting into a Hydra facility in Sovokia. Which of the Avengers warns him to watch his language?
questions.explanation:
Captain America.

	Iron Man couldn't believe that Captain America is the one to warn him of his use of language. Throughout the movie, different Avengers brings up the fact that Captain America didn't like the use of foul language.

questions.text: At the party in Stark's place, which Avenger ends an argument by stating that his girlfriend is better than another Avenger's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Thor.

	Thor and Iron Man go up against each other when it comes to their respective girlfriends being more important than the other's girlfriend. After Maria Hill and Rhody walks away from the argument, Thor leans over to Iron Man and states that Jane is better.
